00035 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORDataGen1DTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00036 {
00037   // check severity to improve speed
00038   if(ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) { 
00039     ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): got one: "
00040                   << "cr-ca-ch-adc = " 
00041                   << fDataGen1DDecoder->CrateOf(record) << "-"
00042                   << fDataGen1DDecoder->CardOf(record) << "-" 
00043                   << fDataGen1DDecoder->ChannelOf(record) << "-" 
00044                   << fDataGen1DDecoder->ADCValueOf(record) << endl;
00045   }
00046 
00047   fCrate = fDataGen1DDecoder->CrateOf(record);
00048   fCard = fDataGen1DDecoder->CardOf(record);
00049   fChannel = fDataGen1DDecoder->ChannelOf(record);
00050   fADC = fDataGen1DDecoder->ADCValueOf(record);
00051 
00052   return kSuccess;
00053 }
